Projects.title: Battleships
Projects.description: A remake of the classic game.

Projects.title: Alexis Designs
Projects.description: A website for a small independent business that specialises in quilts.

Projects.title: Onwards And Upwards
Projects.description: Was contracted to create a registration form that allowed users to create a profile with the company. This was integrated to an existing Wix website, although I additionally created the necessary supplementary pages.

Projects.title: Grizzly Audio Packs
Projects.description: A project submission for CodeInstitute, uses Stripe Payment API,Django frameworks for Python, All-Auth functionality to create accounts and save user details. Creates, reads, updates and deletes JSON data for sales, products and user details.

Projects.title: Clanker - Freelancer's Schedule
Projects.description: A prototype for a freelancer's schedule planner, allowing users to create a client database, add, updadte and delete appointments, with all data being stored securely on MongoDB.
